text: Un été à quatre mains is a French historical fiction novel by Gaëlle Josse about Franz Schubert. The novel gives a fictionalized account of the time Schubert spent at Zseliz with the Esterházy family during the summer of 1828, and of his alleged unrequited love for the young countess Caroline von Esterházy. == External links == * Babelio * SensCritique == References == Category:Novels about composers
title: Un été à quatre mains
